title: The 'Eternals’ Trailer, Prequel Problems, and ‘Mare of Easttown’ Episode 6
description:
Chris and Andy talk about the 'Eternals’ trailer that dropped on Monday morning and what Chloe Zhao’s influence will be on the Marvel movie (3:22). Then they talk about the abundance of prequel movies, including Emma Stone in ‘Cruella’ and Timothée Chalamet as a young Willy Wonka (18:15). Finally, they break down the penultimate episode of ‘Mare of Easttown’ and all of the questions we are left with ahead of the finale (25:09).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Producer: Kaya McMullen
